ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 62
ygData.msgSnippet: What is the location of the Nybright Sisters in the Faydark, and willa 19th lvl monk get exp from them.... ALMOST 20th LVL and next increase. ... From: Ryugen
ygData.messageBody:
What is the location of the Nybright Sisters in the Faydark, and willa 19th
lvl monk get exp from them....

ALMOST 20th LVL and next increase.

-----Original Message-----
From: Ryugen Lee [mailto:ryugen47@...]
Sent: Saturday, September 11, 1999 2:18 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Digest Number 62


From: "Ryugen Lee" <ryugen47@...>

A few thoughts...

Travel to Faydwer and hunt the Nybright sisters in Lesser Faydark for money.

They frequently drop small bronze weapons (rapiers, main gauches, daggers,

and the like), and the experience should still be good at your level.

OR, better yet, hunt in oasis, in a group, either crocs or orcs, until you
make 20, and then start worrying about making money. By then you'll be able

to camp a few things (by yourself) that can make you some money.

Ryugen
Bertoxxulous

>From: Steve Danuser <danu@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>CC: stats@..., and@..., such@...
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Digest Number 62
>Date: Sat, 11 Sep 1999 14:44:24 -0500
>
>From: Steve Danuser <danu@...>
>
>First off, let me say this list is great, and very informative.
>
>I guess my best course of action at level 15 is to simply buy the best stat
>enhancing stuff I can as it comes available. Bottom line is to increase
>your stats as much as possible.
>
>Which brings me to another question... when will I be able to afford this
>stuff? At what level do we start being able to get the big kills that earn
>us hundreds of plat? It's only recently that I've been able to start having
>about 50pp in the bank at any time, and paying 35pp for a +5 AGI ring was a
>major investment for me. My main cash cow has been wisp hunting, but the
>experience I get killing them has started to diminish a lot. Killing Dervs
>is still okay, but doesn't get me much cash unless they have bronze.
>
>I love not having to buy expensive armor and weapons all the time, but it's
>getting to the point where I will need lots of cash to buy jewelry, rare
>items, etc.
>
>By the way, how much should one pay for serpentine bracers?
>
>And at what level can I realistically hope to get journeyman's boots?
>
>_____________________________
>Moorgard, monk striving for Virtue
>Povar
>
